major: Artificial Intelligence (Data Engineering), Bachelor of Engineering
description: AI is shaking the field of technology as we speak. In addition to its impact on the future, it already has a significant impact on our everyday life. The demand for AI specialists with hands-on experience and a deep understanding of these tools that can harness the power of AI in different usage scenarios is growing substantially. Will you be the next AI specialist?
This programme offers a solid foundation in the principles of mathematics and physics, coupled with practical skills in 3D modeling, product development, and materials engineering.

Study logistics engineering including external and outbound logistics. Your studies also include transportation technology and distribution management. During the studies you will gain an understanding of logistics management.
The Mechatronics specialisation in engineering provides you with in-depth knowledge of structures for devices, equipment and systems which are essential part of our modern lives.

major: International Business, Bachelor of Business Administration
description: Our International Business programme will prepare you to work on a broad scale of tasks in international companies. You will be able to handle all necessary operations along the supply chain from raw material supplier to the final consumer.

The degree programme in Nursing will prepare you for a valued profession, in which you will be working with clients of different age groups promoting their health and wellbeing and treating their diseases.
As a physiotherapist you are an expert of movement and functional capacity during all phases of the lifespan.

major: International Tourism Management, Bachelor of Hospitality Management
description: The degree programme provides you with skills and knowledge in developing tourism business and services. You can turn the love for travel into a rewarding career and promote tourism destinations and services. You will also have a possibility to manage sustainable tourism business.

major: Master of Business Administration, Sustainable Business Management, full-time studies
description: Are you looking for moving forward in your professional and academic career? Master's degree programme in Sustainable Business Management is closely connected with working life.

major: Master of Engineering / Business Administration / Maritime Management, Maritime Logistics Management, part-time/online
description: Are you seeking to advance your professional and academic career? Master's degree programme in Maritime Logistics Management is closely connected with working life.

major: Master of Business Administration, Sustainable Business Management, part-time/online
description: Are you looking for moving forward in your professional and academic career? Master's degree programme in Sustainable Business Management is closely connected with working life. On online programme the studies can be completed while working full-time and from anywhere in Finland or abroad.
